import { Avatar } from '@material-ui/core'; import React from 'react'; import './Post.css'; import ThumbUpIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUp'; import ChatBubbleOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ChatBubbleOutlined'; import AccountCircleIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AccountCircle'; import NearMeIcon from '@material-ui/icons/NearMe'; import { ExpandMoreOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons'; function Post({ profilePic, image, username, timestamp, message }) { return (

{username}

{/*

{new Data(timestamp?.toData()).toUTCString()}

*/}

{new Date()}

{message}

Like

Comment

Share

) } export default Post
